name: Ariestoolkit
tagline: Mi2 OpenSource Pc Suite For Xiaomi Mi2(s) [aries]
body:
```
$ echo "Best Pc Suite For Xiaomi Mi2 (S)"
$ echo " English Language, not Chinese as Official Pc suite "
$ echo "  Support All Custom Rom Running not only Miui"
$ echo "   Open Source"
```

ariestoolkit
============

Mi2 OpenSource Pc Suite For Xiaomi Mi2(s) [aries] 

This is an open source Pc Suite For your Xiaomi Mi2(s)


--------------------------------------------------
Features:

 # 1-Install Custom Rom And Recovery
 
 # 2-Unbrick Phone
 
 # 3-Sync Music and Photos
 
 # 4-Backup And Restore
 
 # 5-Unistall Apps
 
 # 6-Edit Partitions
 
 # 7-Shell Commands

 # 8-More on the Way
 
 

What Do you Need?
-------------------------------------------------

 #1-Linux Or Unix or Windows Pc (Mac Os X too because it's a Unix based os)
 
 #2-Adb and Fastboot (only on unix/linux, on windows they're include yet)
 
 #3-a Usb Cable
 
 #4-Xiaomi Mi2 / Mi2s (Mi2A doesn't work, if you want to fork this to add its support, tell me and you're welcome)
 

### Authors and Contributors
Developer : @ionolinuxnoparty
Thanks To : @M1cha
